textos_fuente.text: COPPER BLUES & DESERT RIDGE IMPROV IS NOW HIRING: ALL POSITIONS - Copper Blues Live Skip to main content Home Menus Kitchen Cocktails Live Music/Events Live Music/Events Private Events Info/FAQ Desert Ridge Marketplace (Change Location) Arizona Desert Ridge Marketplace Downtown Phoenix Florida Miami (Doral) California Oxnard Brea Copper Blues Preloader Logo COPPER BLUES & DESERT RIDGE IMPROV IS NOW HIRING: ALL POSITIONS COPPER BLUES & DESERT RIDGE IMPROV IS NOW HIRING: ALL POSITIONS [MEET US EVERY WEDNESDAY FROM 11AM ‚Äì 1PM]! Applicants can apply in-person at the venue, so swing by & apply! Every Wednesday from 11am-1pm! Copper Blues & Desert Ridge Improv | 21001 N. Tatum Blvd Phoenix, AZ 85050 BRING YOUR RESUME & A SMILE! ‚Ä¢ NO APPOINTMENT NEEDED ‚Ä¢ WALK-INS WELCOME If you LOVE Live Comedy + Live Music, and thrive in a party environment be sure to swing by & apply. Ever hear the saying that laughter is the best medicine? Imagine working somewhere that you are surrounded by it. Desert Ridge Improv is home to the biggest names in comedy including: Gabriel Iglesias, David Spade, Pete Davidson, Nate Bargatze, Eric Andre, Tom Segura, Mike Epps, Whitney Cummings, Bill Burr, Ali Wong, Steve-O, Jeff Ross, Marc Maron, Shawn Wayans, Damon Wayans, Jr., Michelle Wolf, Jim Jefferies, Tiffany Haddish, Craig Robinson and many more regularly perform on our stage!!! Copper Blues Rock Pub & Kitchen features an ongoing rotation of free nightly entertainment to keep the party going including Dueling Pianos, Cover Bands, Tribute Acts, Lost in Country, and the best in Local Live Music! We are ALWAYS looking for our next ROCKSTAR! Can‚Äôt make it in person!? Email your resume to info@desertridgeimprov.com to schedule an interview. (Included in your email should be a paragraph describing your experience, availability, what position you are applying for, and what would make you a great asset to our team) Must have a BIG SMILE, be a team player, have a passion for customer service and a POSITIVE attitude is a must! May 22, 2024 | 11:00AM Copper Blues Desert Ridge Marketplace Reserved Seating Make A Reservation Let's Stay Connected Info Careers Contact Copper Blues - Desert Ridge Marketplace 21001 N. Tatum Blvd Phoenix AZ 85050 (602) 910-5161 Reservations Hours - HAPPY HOUR / 4PM - 7PM (WED - SUN) - *EXCLUDING GAME DAYS & SPECIAL EVENTS* - HOURS OF OPERATION - WEDNESDAY: 4PM - 10 PM THURSDAY: 4 PM - 11 PM FRIDAY - SATURDAY: 4 PM - 12 AM SUNDAY: 4 PM - 10 PM **KITCHEN IS OPEN UNTIL ONE HOUR BEFORE CLOSE** Copper Club The Copper Club is a membership only program that gives you early access to our upcoming events. Miami - Copper Blues Live Skip to main content Home Menus Kitchen Cocktails Live Music/Events Live Music/Events Private Events Info/FAQ Miami (Change Location) Arizona Desert Ridge Marketplace Downtown Phoenix Florida Miami (Doral) California Oxnard Brea Copper Blues Preloader Logo Copper Blues Miami Kitchen The Copper Blues Kitchen is a fusion of your favorite comfort foods and elevated pub fare perfectly designed to complement the excitement and vibrancy of our live entertainment! See Food Menu Cocktails Cocktails are the focus at Copper Blues combining flavors and presentation that match the energy of the room. Our craft cocktails aren't just drinks; they're a harmonious fusion of tradition and innovation perfectly complementing the rhythm of the live music that graces our stage seven nights a week. Get ready to raise your glass to an unforgettable night where music and mixology collide in perfect harmony! See Drink Menu Music Copper Blues features the best live music 7 nights a week with acoustic acts for happy hour and killer bands on the weekends! Come see the best cover bands without a cover charge and don‚Äôt miss other special events with DJs, tribute bands and more! Calendar View List View Featured View Live Music Live Event September Load More October Load More November Load More Reservations We fill up fast and recommend planning ahead so make sure to find a table below and we‚Äôll save your seats! Make A Reservation You Had Me At Brunch Every weekend at Copper Blues enjoy live music, performances, and brunch specials. E-Mail for Brunch Reservations Book Your Special Event We throw killer parties so let us know what you're looking for and we'll go above and beyond to make you look like a Rock Star! Get in touch Social From live music to special events and DJs, you never know what we have planned so make sure to follow us on our socials so you‚Äôre always in the know on all things Copper! About Us ‚Äî Copper Blues Bar & Grill 0 Skip to Content Copper Blues Bar & Grill Home Eat Drink About Us Gallery Reservations Corporate Functions NYE RSVP Feature Menu Open Menu Close Menu Copper Blues Bar & Grill Home Eat Drink About Us Gallery Reservations Corporate Functions NYE RSVP Feature Menu Open Menu Close Menu Home Eat Drink About Us Gallery Reservations Corporate Functions NYE RSVP Feature Menu About Us About Copper Blues Copper Blues Bar & Grill opened its doors on February 12, 2002 becoming the pioneer restaurant in the Blue Mountain Village. Dustin, Karii and Cindy have realized their dream of establishing their premier dining restaurant and with their collective experience in the hospitality industry, each has his or her own area of expertise to offer this ever thriving and changing business. Our Executive Chef, Terry Prince, has over 40 years of experience in the Culinary Arts. We are proud that he has been with Copper Blues for over a decade! Chef Prince hand-picks his culinary team and partnered with our service professionals create an unforgettable dining experience. Please join us for your next corporate function or social event . We specialize in providing parties of all sizes with an. unsurpassed culinary experience. To learn more about us or to book an event please visit our Corporate Functions Page . Share your positive dining experience on Trip Advisor ‚Äì click here. Location 156 Jozo Weider Blvd., Unit #3 Blue Mountains, ON L9Y 0V2 Hours Monday ‚Äî Friday 11am ‚Äî 10pm Saturday ‚Äî¬†Sunday 11am ‚Äî 10pm Follow us on Instagram for food and drink specials!! Please note a minimum $20 cost per guest may apply. An 18% Gratuity will be applied to food and beverage purchases for groups more than 5 guests.  Prices do not include sales tax, 1% village enhancement fee & 2% credit card transaction fee. Contact info@copperblues.com ( 705) 446-2643
